question: you have just read an article in a national newspaper which claims that town centers in your country all look very similar to each other you don't fully agree with this opinion.write a letter to the editor of the newspaper. In your lettersay which points in the article you agree withexplain ways in which your town center is different from most other town centersOffered to give a guided tour of your town to the writer of the article
text: This letter is in response to information provided in the article from the national newspaper. The article claims that the first time calculation monument was invented in England but the information is not correct. The first monument was built in India and there are proofs of that as well.

It is situated in Jaipur, Rajasthan, there are huge monuments that calculate time on the basis of the sun. Both the monuments look similar in the way they are built but work completely differently. The one situated in England works on the principle of water. With this, there is another monument located in New Delhi, India. It also works on the same approach.

If the writer of this article or anyone from your team ever gets an opportunity to visit India, then I would like to provide a guided tour of the monuments situated here. And I would also like you to rectify the information provided in the article.
